post.text: Unbelievable afternoon in Wilmington, North Carolina. The MOVEMENT continues to grow, as American's realize that Crooked Hillary is not fit to be our next President. I am in this to WIN- and together WE will MAKE AMERICA SAFE & GREAT AGAIN! -DJT

comment.author: Jordan
comment.text: Did Donald Trump just suggest shooting Hillary Clinton over the Supreme Court?

replies.author: James
replies.text: It would seem so and the Trump supporters are praising him. We all know he will try to downplay it, as usual and Trump supporters will buy it.

replies.author: Jordan
replies.text: They are blind sheep and they are the ones that will be hurt the most by Drump

replies.author: Anna
replies.text: Trump didn't suggested that. You're the one that made the 2nd amendment people a violent human beings.

replies.author: Jordan
replies.text: WTF Anna did you listen to what he said Drump is deranged
